title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Controls option - customize key bindings
description:
In this how to we are going to look at how to customize key bindings. Based on my own experience as well as from some of my subscribers it looks like something has changed after a specific update (I think SU5) which allows you to assign multiple functions to the same button which results in unexpected behavior. In this video I will show you how you can correctly reassign functions to previously used keys/buttons.

tags: Customize key bindings do not work in MSFS 2020
